div.p: This operation is a utility for converting a CDA to a FHIR Clinical Document Bundle.

Many clinical documents are represented as CDA and many legacy systems will likely continue to produce CDA. It will be useful for FHIR servers to offer a means of transforming CDA to FHIR Clinical Documents in order for the server to consume them. This operation offers a standard endpoint for this operation.
